mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_group_message(group_code, sender_id, content, type, create_time) VALUES(#{groupCode}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{type}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM chat_group_message m LEFT JOIN chat_group_message_read r ON m.id = r.message_id AND r.user_code = #{userId} WHERE m.group_code = #{groupCode} AND r.read_state = 0 ORDER BY m.create_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO chat_group_message_read (message_id, user_code, read_state) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{userId}, 0)
